        public static String[] slice(String[] strings,
             int begin,
             int length)
        Create a smaller array from an existing one.
        Parameters:
        strings - an array containing element of type String
        begin - the starting position of the sub-array
        length - the number of element to consider
        Returns:
        a new array continaining only the selected elements

      • indexOf

        public static <T> int indexOf(T[] array,
              T element)
        Return the position of an element inside an array
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of elements in the array
        Parameters:
        array - the array where it looks for an element
        element - the element to find in the array
        Returns:
        the position of the element if it's found in the array, -1 otherwise

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(Object[] array,
               Object element)
        Check if an array contains an element.
        Parameters:
        array - the array with all the elements
        element - the element to find in the array
        Returns:
        true if the array contains the element

        Parameters:

        second - the second array
        Returns:
